existing_features.title: Fix the landing page project type flow so that when a user selects 'Landing Page' in NewSessionPage and sends a message in ChatPage, the llmService returns a complete, working landing page scaffold (HTML structure, hero section, features, CTA, and styles) instead of failing silently or producing no output.

Ensure the landing page template in llmService.ts generates a visually polished scaffold that matches Noventra.Ai's dark theme (OKLCH color tokens, glassmorphism, Space Grotesk font) and includes sections: Hero, Features, How It Works, and CTA with appropriate copy about Noventra.Ai building any project app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a landing page for the Noventra.Ai app
